messages.content:
==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-12T09:15:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Site Supervisor
  Project Phase: Defect Liability Period
  4D Task Status: TASK_999: General Inspection - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Site Supervisor: Found some hairline cracks on this surface.
  Site Supervisor: See attached photo.

[USER QUERY]
  Check this crack.
==================================================
The image analysis is not available. I can try to find elements that match the description 'hairline cracks on this surface' if you provide the photo.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-10T14:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Facade Specialist
  Project Phase: Module Installation
  4D Task Status: TASK_505: Module Installation 6 - Sixth Floor - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Facade Specialist: I am on the gondola outside. The sealant looks loose here.

[USER QUERY]
  Is the sealant leaking here?
==================================================

I am sorry, I cannot fulfill this request. The available tools lack the functionality to determine if sealant is leaking. I can search for elements that match the description "loose sealant" on the "6 - Sixth Floor", but I cannot confirm if it is actively leaking.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-10T11:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Main Con Supervisor
  Project Phase: Handover
  4D Task Status: TASK_045: Ground Level Cladding - COMPLETED

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Main Con Supervisor: The park-facing unit has a gap.

[USER QUERY]
  Check the window joint defect.
==================================================

I am sorry, I cannot fulfill this request. The available tools lack the ability to process visual information or match text descriptions to elements in the BIM model. Therefore, I cannot check the window joint defect.
